name: Arabica
description: Arabica coffee is known for its delicate flavor and low acidity.

name: Robusta
description: Robusta coffee has a strong, bitter flavor and high caffeine content.

name: Kona
description: Kona coffee is grown exclusively in the Kona region of Hawaii and has a rich, smooth flavor.

name: Colombian
description: Colombian coffee is known for its bright, fruity flavor and medium acidity.

name: Espresso
description: Espresso is a strong, concentrated coffee with a rich, creamy texture.

name: French Roast
description: French roast coffee is roasted to a dark, rich color and has a bold, smoky flavor.

name: Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a layer of foam.

name: Decaf
description: Decaf coffee has had most of its caffeine removed, but still retains its flavor.
